long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Block Distractions on YouTube: Stay Focused and Enhance Your Viewing Experience!

New Modes:

* Light Mode YouTube: Switch to a brighter interface for better daytime viewing.
* Night Mode YouTube: Enjoy a darker, eye-friendly interface for late-night sessions.

Tired of getting sidetracked while watching videos on YouTube? Our extension is designed to help you stay focused by blocking various distractions on the platform. Whether you're studying, working, or simply want a clutter-free viewing experience, this tool is perfect for you!

Key Features:

* Top Header: Hide the top header for a cleaner interface.
* Notification: Remove notification pop-ups.
* Home Header Tabs: Eliminate tabs on the homepage.
* Home Feed: Clean up your home feed for a distraction-free experience.
* Shorts Videos & Tab: Block Shorts videos and their tab.
* Video Side Bar: Hide the sidebar next to videos.
* Recommended Videos: Remove recommended video suggestions.
* Live Chats: Disengage from live chat distractions.
* End Screen Feed: Clean up end screens at the end of videos.
* Video Comments: Remove video comments from your view.
* Video Info: Hide video information for a streamlined interface.
* Subscription Tab: Hide the subscription tab.
* History: Block access to your watch history.
* Downloads: Remove download options.
* Watch Later: Hide the Watch Later list.

Support Us:
If you appreciate our extension and would like to support its continued development, please consider making a donation. You'll find the donation option in the footer of the extension. Your support helps us enhance and maintain the tool for a better experience!

Customize your YouTube experience and make your viewing sessions more productive and enjoyable. Download now and take control of your YouTube distractions!

"The use of the YouTube(TM) name or trademark is for  identification, reference or descriptive purposes only and does not imply any association with YouTube(TM)  or their product brand".


Note: This extension is not authorized by YouTube.
